mapper.select: SELECT id, title, type FROM zhousb_blog WHERE id < #{id} AND type = #{type} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT id, title, type FROM zhousb_blog WHERE id > #{id} AND type = #{type} LIMIT 1

SELECT zhousb_blog.title, type, zhousb_blog_type.`name` typeName, content, zhousb_blog.remark, pv, zhousb_blog.gmt_create FROM zhousb_blog LEFT JOIN zhousb_blog_type ON type = zhousb_blog_type.`key` WHERE zhousb_blog.state = 0 AND zhousb_blog.id = #{id}
